title: nI sEva bhAgyam
sahitya:
nI sEva bhAgamiyyavE nanu nija dAsuDanu jEyavE


anupallavi

  IshAvAsyamaina bhuvini Elu shakti mElu mElu


caraNam    AshApAsha baddhamaina aTusulOna paTipollaka ahankAra rahitamaina 
amala cittam osagi tEjOnmaya cinmaya dIpamu veliginci divya shuddha 
jIvanambu bhavya bhaktulaku galuka jhankAra shruti gUrcci sapta 
svaramu sancarinci shrngAra vara vINA gAna pUjA niyamamutO
